name: MayorVille
overview:
Hi there, we would like to introduce our new social networking site: â€˜MayorVilleâ€™.

MayorVille is a new revolution in social networking, based on cities instead of the individual, it allows users to connect and share while building their citiesâ€™ community. MayorVille is FREE to join!

With a database of over 80,000 cities worldwide to choose from, users are sure to find their hometown or city. MayorVille also offers the chance to become (virtual) Mayor of any city across the globe. By becoming Mayor users will be able to earn virtual and real money from local advertisers in their city.

MayorVille offers great advertising opportunities for local businesses, enabling them to reach their target market at a low cost.

Users are able to upload news stories, photos and videos, and can also recommend restaurants, nightlife and attractions to other citizens
